channel.title: Banned from the status page
channel.description:
Hello,
Recently I was banned from the status page. To my knowledge I was not breaking any rules at the time. All of our votes are legitimate, we had 99% uptime, and we have been around since September of 2013. I contacted Moparisthebest on the 25th a few times to try and resolve the issue but he has been reluctant to reply back. I am looking for answers, and possibly a positive resolution if it's possible.
Jason.

item.title: Banned from the status page
item.dc:creator: @Veldahar Veldahar
item.description:
@Veldahar wrote:

Thank you for the calm and collective advice as well as help. I can assure you, and any other member of this community that the game I am working on does not promote the sale of staff positions. I will take the steps you mentioned to try and get this resolved,

Thank you :),

Jason.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the status page
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

If you were banned, it’s probably for a reason not just out of the blue (like selling staff positions, etc. etc.)

Sorry bud but you probably won’t get that much of a reply from MITB since he gets spammed with this stuff on the daily but if you want to anyways try talking to Tom (https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=284102) or Zuppers (https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=101530) about it if not, try contacting an active sectional moderator (John would be your best bet) and maybe they will relay your message. If all that fails, I would jump on the IRC (Chat tab next to messages) and hop on #mopar, #moparscape, #help (if that still exists) and shoot a message and wait (keeping the client up)

Keep calm, don’t get mad and say stuff you’ll later regret.

Good luck with your appeal!

Read full topic
